dmca.title: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Abercrombie Direct [mailto:sales@abercrombie-direct.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 2004 2:45 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Violation

You are hosting a site imagerap.com which has stolen our entire site and
content. We have sent several emails about this and this far you have dont
nothing.

Our site is redsplash.com all text, images were created by our in house
development team.
http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/whois.ch?ip=redsplash.com
This shows you that the site is owned by us kytec inc.

Thanks
Edward Upton - Ceo
Kytec.com
